string.value: #b#@1032106:##k in #b#m101000000##k has a favor to ask...

Something slimy is making it hard for the fairies to fly in the forest.

He has asked you to eliminate #rSlimes#k and bring back 20 #rSquishy Liquids#k 20.

Report back to #b#@1032106:##k in #b#m101000000##k when you finish collecting all the Squishy Liquids.
You have collected 20 #rSquishy Liquids#k for #b#p1032106##k. He thanked you for helping the fairies roam the forest freely.

I almost got seriously hurt during my jaunt in the woods a few days ago. I was whistling and singing as I flew through the forest, when some strange green liquid splashed on me. It was so sticky that I couldn't fly, and I ended up crashing.
Luckily, I fell on a bed of leaves, so I didn't get hurt.\n\nI went and looked at what it was, and it was the #rSquishy Liquid#k from #rSlimes#k. Yuck!

So, I'm asking you to eliminate the #rSlimes#k and collect 20 #rSquishy Liquid#k. I'll then take them and burn them away!\n\nThose #rSlimes#k are everywhere, so you should be able to find them easily.
How can you say 'no' to that?!

Oh, you've brought them. Let's see, let's see!

Ew, gross.

Let me have them. I'll burn them to the grave!
Yuck, it stinks while burning too.\n\nBut I can finally fly around the forest with freedom! Thank you.
Eliminate the #rSlimes#k and bring me 20 #rSquishy Liquids#k. If you're not ready to do this for me, don't even talk to me!
